title: Shap tries to import LGBM?
body:
MacOS, LGBM 2.1.0 (latest), SHAP 0.14.1 (latest)

```import shap
shap.initjs()
shap.force_plot(shap_values[0,:], X.iloc[0,:])
```

_OSError                                   Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-12-79756c247a47> in <module>()
----> 1 import shap
      2 shap.initjs()
      3 shap.force_plot(shap_values[0,:], X.iloc[0,:])

      7 from .explainers.kernel import KernelExplainer, kmeans
----> 8 from .explainers.tree import TreeExplainer
